data.name: Dawn of Corruption
data.detailed_description:
Dawn of Corruption is a Dark Fantasy NSFW RPG.

Warning, this game is nsfw 18+ only.
It features male gay characters and fetishes such as:
Muscle Growth, Macro, Hyper, Goo, Transformation, Corruption

What will you grow into? Will corruption seep into your being?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 or later
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

content_descriptors.notes:
Dawn of Corruption contains frequent depictions of sex acts including but not limited to fetish content, nudity, huge insertions, vore, bodily fluids, macro, hyper, goo, transformation, multi-limbs and more.

The narrative includes themes of a sexual nature including  exploration of inner desires, mind control. Enemies can dominate the player sexually on some context but the player always have an opportunity to escape before it reaches that point.

The game contains descriptions of violence through its combat mechanics and plot. Some scenes describe wounds with visual details.
